   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Orange County Lettings's documentation!
==================================================
**Orange County Lettings** is a website application for rental of real estate.
You can visit the website by `cliking here <https://kolobov-p13-10017e0c2e8f.herokuapp.com/>`_.

Technical stack of this project:

* Languages: Python and it's :ref:`dependences <requirements>`, HTML, CSS
* Frameworks: Django
* Pipeline CICD: CircleCi, Docker, Heroku
* Logging: Sentry


Check out the :doc:`installation` and :doc:`starting_guide` for starting to use the application qickly

.. note::

   It is recommended to have the basic understanding of `Django Framework <https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.0/>`_

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
